x + y + 2v = x + v + y + v = 3623 + 4533 = 8156
y + w + x + w - v = x + y - v + 2w = 6331 + 5421 - 2312 = 9440
[x+w][x+v] = 54213623
x + y + v + w = 1311 + 2221 + 2312 + 4110 = 9954
